channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins ElasTest Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins ElasTest Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2273|2024-08-04T07:01:41.222Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elastest%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins ElasTest Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2272|2024-08-04T07:01:41.265Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elastest%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins ElasTest Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-2274|2024-08-04T07:01:41.263Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20elastest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins ElasTest Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier stores its server password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
